guide.conclusion: Thank you for submitting your project request.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Open File Maker Pro and, in the Status Report layout, find the project that you want to submit for project building and review. In this example, we will use M031 Major Project Meat Smoker.
lines.text_raw: Open File Maker Pro and, in the Status Report layout, find the project that you want to submit for project building and review. In this example, we will use M031 Major Project Meat Smoker.

lines.text: On the left-hand side, right click and select "Copy Record".
lines.text_raw: On the left-hand side, right click and select "Copy Record".

lines.text: Open the "Make Labs: Project Whiteboard" spreadsheet using the link.
lines.text_raw: Open the [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AtkSN4IJGIYhdFNvOXhOYS1DNFF1bUtMMlBLUWQ0bEE&hl=en_US&pli=1#gid=0|"Make Labs: Project Whiteboard"] spreadsheet using the link.

lines.text: Click on the "Form" tab at the top of the page, and click on the "Go to live form." This will bring up the "Make Labs: Project Whiteboard" Google form.
lines.text_raw: Click on the "Form" tab at the top of the page, and click on the "Go to live form." This will bring up the "Make Labs: Project Whiteboard" Google form.

lines.text: FileMaker Pro Data: at the top of the form, click inside the text box and paste the information from File Maker Pro.
lines.text_raw: '''FileMaker Pro Data:''' at the top of the form, click inside the text box and paste the information from File Maker Pro.

lines.text: DO NOT ALTER THE TEXT! It will look funky, but that is OK.
lines.text_raw: DO NOT ALTER THE TEXT! It will look funky, but that is OK.

lines.text: Step Shots: please indicate if the project will need step shots before assigning to the Lab for building/testing. Use the "Other" option for any additional notes or special circumstances.
lines.text_raw: '''Step Shots:''' please indicate if the project will need step shots before assigning to the Lab for building/testing. Use the "Other" option for any additional notes or special circumstances.

lines.text: If you leave this portion blank, you will not be able to submit the form until you click one of the options.
lines.text_raw: If you leave this portion blank, you will not be able to submit the form until you click one of the options.

lines.text: Other media: if you would like to request something other than step-shots, please indicate this here. If you do not want anything special, then type "none" in the "Other" option.
lines.text_raw: '''Other media:''' if you would like to request something other than step-shots, please indicate this here. If you do not want anything special, then type "none" in the "Other" option.

lines.text: Number of Builds: if you would like more than one version of the project built, please indicate the number in the box. This mainly applies to Major Projects, Special Section, and DIY projects that can be shown off at Maker Faires and special events.
lines.text_raw: '''Number of Builds:''' if you would like more than one version of the project built, please indicate the number in the box.  This mainly applies to Major Projects, Special Section, and DIY projects that can be shown off at Maker Faires and special events.

lines.text: Editorial Notes: feel free to insert any additional notes or comments here. These are VERY VERY VERY helpful!
lines.text_raw: '''Editorial Notes:''' feel free to insert any additional notes or comments here. These are VERY VERY  VERY helpful!

lines.text: With everything filled in, hit the Submit button at the bottom of the page.
lines.text_raw: With everything filled in, hit the Submit button at the bottom of the page.

lines.text: You will see a confirmation message pop up in your browser.
lines.text_raw: You will see a confirmation message pop up in your browser.

lines.text: All the information from your form will be sent directly to the Make Labs: Project Whiteboard at the very bottom of the page. This will automatically send an email alert to the Intern Coordinator, who will then review the project and assign a due date before finally assigning to a MAKE Engineering Intern and move it from the bottom of the stack.
lines.text_raw: All the information from your form will be sent directly to the Make Labs: Project Whiteboard at the very bottom of the page. This will automatically send an email alert to the Intern Coordinator, who will then review the project and assign a due date before finally assigning to a MAKE Engineering Intern and move it from the bottom of the stack.

guide.summary: This brief tutorial will show you how to enter information from the Editorial File Maker Pro data base and quickly transfer the information into the MAKE Labs Project Spreadsheet.
guide.title: How to Enter Projects into MAKE Labs: Project Whiteboard Spreadsheet
